main event: 11 disc-shaped objects were sighted maneuvering over an observation point in Roy, Utah on March 31, 1966.
interesting points: The objects were described as disc-shaped and were maneuvering individually and collectively, following an aircraft, with two side by side and one following.
The objects were reported to have been observed on radar as well.
The objects moved at extreme speeds and appeared to split up and proceed in different directions.
The witnesses were described as mature and of good judgment.
